## {{< fa landmark >}} Logistics

- **Lectures:** are on Tuesday/Thursday 3:00-4:20pm in person in Kaleido Tower.
- **Lecture Videos:** are available on IE's platform for all the enrolled students.
- **Public resources:** The lecture slides and assignments will be posted online as the course progresses. We are happy for anyone to use these resources, but we cannot grade the work of any students who are not officially enrolled in the class.
- **Contact:** Students should ask all course-related questions on IE's platform (accessible from Intranet), where you will also find announcements. For external inquiries, personal matters, or in emergencies, you can email [Julio](mailto:julioantonio.sotovicente@gmail.com)
